longInfo:
Passport required.
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  must be valid
  for the period of intended stay.
- British passports endorsed  British Subject  which also
  contain a Certificate of Entitlement to the Right of Abode
  issued by the United Kingdom must be valid for the period of
  intended stay. 
- British passports endorsed  British Overseas Territories
  Citizen  issued by Gibraltar must be valid on arrival.
- Identity Cards issued by Gibraltar must be valid on arrival.
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.
- Other British passports must be valid for at least 3 months
  beyond the period of intended stay.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of Identity Cards issued by Gibraltar.

Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Citizen .
Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Overseas Territories Citizen , issued by
Gibraltar. 
Visa required, except for Holders of Identity Cards issued by
Gibraltar.
Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Subject , containing a Certificate of
Entitlement to the Right of Abode issued by the United
Kingdom. 
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days: (SEE NOTE
53527) 
    NOTE 53527: The max. stay is granted within 180 days. 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British Overseas
   Territories Citizen , issued by 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British
   Subject , not containing a Certificate of Entitlement to
   the Right of Abode issued by the United Kingdom; 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British National
   (Overseas) ,  British Overseas Citizen  or  British
   Protected Person"; 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay as follows:
  - at least EUR 100.- per day of stay; or
  - at least EUR 50.- per day of stay if holding a confirmed
  invitation or a tourist voucher.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry (SEE NOTE 43780).
    NOTE 43780: Not applicable to nationals of United Kingdom
